1162910.name: Baaxal Yuum
1162910.description:
Egon is a third-person shooter game that allows you to play with up to 3 friends in cooperative mode, in an apocalyptic world the Egonians will have to explore and fight to end the Infection that almost ends with the planet, having to close the Generator of energy where different types of Infected come from.

Set on the surface of Egon in 2040, you will have to resist and end the wave of infected, while acquiring different types of weapons and characters.

In the course of the game you will have to complete 50 thousand points to turn off the Protective Shield that the Generator registers, while you annihilate your enemies who in return will give you points to obtain weapons, characters and new maps.

As you advance, the number of infected will increase considerably, you will have to find and eliminate each of the Zombies, Runner and Crancks that appear.

It includes:

-The possibility of obtaining 12 exceptional weapons.
-Cooperative multiplayer mode for 4 players.

Egon offers an exciting experience as players explore and fight to survive the surge of infected.
1162910.supported_languages:
西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
